item.title: 疑似疫情导致澳大利亚船上 100 头牛死亡
item.description: 在一艘从澳大利亚前往印度尼西亚的活畜出口船上，至少有 100 头牛因疾病爆发而死亡，这凸显了活畜出口的福利风险。【原文：A disease outbreak has killed at least 100 cattle traveling on a live-export ship from Australia to Indonesia, highlighting welfare risks of exporting livestock.】

item.title: 头号发货国越南的咖啡供应量将进一步萎缩
item.description: 由于热浪威胁到头号出口国越南的生产，加上农民改种其他作物造成的损失，意式浓缩咖啡和速溶饮料中使用的罗布斯塔咖啡的全球供应将进一步紧缩。【原文：Global supplies of robusta coffee used in espresso and instant drinks are set to tighten further as a heat wave threatens production in top exporter Vietnam, compounding losses from farmers switching to other crops.】

item.title: 马哈蒂尔之子称 98 岁父亲是马来西亚调查的目标
item.description: 马哈蒂尔-穆罕默德的两个长子说，马来西亚反贪局命令他们协助调查他们的父亲，首次披露了一项长达数月的调查是针对这位 98 岁的前总理的。【原文：Mahathir Mohamad’s two eldest sons said Malaysia’s anti-graft agency ordered them to assist with an investigation into their father, revealing for the first time that a monthslong probe is targeting the 98-year-old former premier.】

item.title: 美国首席执行官在最后一刻受邀与习近平会面后延长在华逗留时间
item.description: 一些在北京参加商业峰会的美国高管在收到周三与中国最高领导人--人们普遍认为是习近平主席--会晤的邀请后，正在重新调整他们计划已久的日程安排。【原文：Some US executives in Beijing for a business summit are rejigging their long-planned schedules after receiving an invite to a Wednesday meeting with a top Chinese leader – widely expected to be President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 小林制药扩大跌幅，因有报道称其药片使用者死亡
item.description: 日本制药商小林制药株式会社（Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.【原文：Shares of Japanese drugmaker Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co. extended Monday’s slump after the company said it received a report one of the users of its recalled supplement pills died due to kidney disease.】

item.title: 泰国大亨的房地产公司因旅游业蓬勃发展而盈利大增
item.description: 泰国首富控制的一家酒店和购物中心开发商预计，近期国际游客的激增将提高其今年第一季度的收益。【原文：A Thai developer of hotels and shopping malls controlled by the country’s richest man expects the recent surge in international tourists to boost its first quarter earnings this year.】

item.title: 日元疲软令日本人放弃海外交易套期保值
item.description: 投资者对日元进一步走软的预期越来越强烈，这一点从日本央行在承诺保持宽松政策的同时提高利率后套期保值成本下降就可见一斑。【原文：Expectations of further yen weakening are getting more entrenched among investors, as seen in tumbling hedging costs after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates while pledging to keep policy easy.】

item.title: 民意调查后的平静让印度期权交易商面临惊喜
item.description: 印度期权交易商似乎相对不担心即将到来的大选会扰乱市场的稳步攀升，这可能会使他们容易受到意外结果的影响。【原文：Indian option traders appear to be relatively unconcerned that the upcoming general election will disrupt the market’s steady climb higher, potentially leaving them vulnerable to an unexpected outcome.】

item.title: 蒂姆-库克对中国的热爱帮助习近平消除对经济衰退的担忧
item.description: 世界第二大经济体结构性放缓的不利论调得到了全球顶级公司首席执行官们的热情支持，这为中国反击这一论调的努力提供了动力。【原文：China’s efforts to counter the downbeat narrative about a structural slowdown in the world’s second-biggest economy got a boost from enthusiastic endorsements from chief executives of top global companies.】

item.title: 中国人民银行扩大对人民币的支持，将定盘价提高至 1 月以来最高水平
item.description: 中国央行加强了对处于压力之下的人民币的支持，上调了有管理货币的每日参考利率，上调幅度为 1 月份以来最大。【原文：China’s central bank reinforced its support for the under-pressure yuan by raising its daily reference rate for the managed currency by the most since January.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布前黄金维持在历史高位附近
item.description: 黄金保持了周一的涨势，原因是投资者在关键的美国通胀数据公布前保持谨慎，这些数据可能会让交易商对美联储何时开始降息有更坚定的看法。【原文：Gold held Monday’s gain as investors remained cautious ahead of key US inflation data, which may provide traders with a firmer view on when the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会在前生物技术高管审判中测试内幕交易理论
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）的一名律师告诉陪审团，一名前生物技术公司高管在交易竞争对手公司股票时获得的 12 万美元暴利 "就像在一场游戏中下注，你知道谁会赢"，因为他知道自己的公司即将被收购，这很可能会刺激竞争对手。【原文：A lawyer for the US Securities and Exchange Commission told a jury that a former biotech executive’s $120,000 windfall on a trade in a competing company’s stock was “like betting on a game when you know who’s going to win” because he knew the pending takeover of his firm would likely boost its rival.】

item.title: 澳大利亚计划在 2025 年对金融系统进行首次压力测试
item.description: 澳大利亚金融监管机构正计划进行一次全系统压力测试，以评估银行业以外的冲击可能造成的影响。【原文：Australia’s financial regulator is planning a system-wide stress test to gauge the potential impact of shocks beyond the banking industry.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好波音公司首席执行官即将卸任。美国股市喘了口气。美国垃圾级公司的利息成本上升。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Boeing's CEO is stepping down. US stocks take a breather. Interest costs for junk-rated US companies rise. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: Blackstone 的皇冠赌场被认定适合保留墨尔本赌场执照
item.description: 皇冠度假村保留了其墨尔本旗舰赌场的经营许可，此前政府任命的管理者发现该公司已经纠正了一系列错误行为，包括少缴税、协助洗钱和利用问题赌徒。【原文：Crown Resorts retained the license to operate its flagship Melbourne casino, after a government-appointed manager found the company had rectified a litany of wrongdoing including underpaying taxes, facilitating money laundering and exploiting problem gamblers.】

item.title: 石油保持升势，欧佩克+减产和地缘政治成为焦点
item.description: 在中东和俄罗斯局势紧张的情况下，欧佩克+将确认其减产政策，石油创下一周来最大涨幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest gain in a week, with OPEC+ set to affirm its policy of production cuts amid tensions in the Middle East and Russia.】

item.title: 尽管市场繁荣，日本全球银行的奖金却在缩水
item.description: 日本市场的蓬勃发展增加了东京国际银行家的工作量，但有一点没有改变，那就是顽固的低薪。【原文：Booming markets in Japan have swelled the workload for international bankers in Tokyo but one thing hasn’t changed — stubbornly low pay.】

item.title: 华尔街涨势受阻，亚洲交易员态度谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市从推动 S&P 500 指数创下多项纪录的涨势中回落之后，亚洲股市大多将以弱势开盘，这引发了市场对美国股市走得太快太远的猜测。【原文：Asian stocks were mostly set to open weaker after US equities pulled back from a rally that drove the S&P 500 to multiple records, spurring speculation the market has gone too far, too fast.】

item.title: 中国网络攻击：澳大利亚简报
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。今日必读：- 澳大利亚和新西兰联合谴责中国黑客攻击- 澳大利亚政府支持率下降- 投资者对澳大利亚气候政策更有信心。【原文：Good morning, it is Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s what you need to know today.Today’s must-reads:• Australia, New Zealand join condemnation of China hacking• Support for Australia’s government is falling• Investors more confident in Australia’s climate policy】

item.title: 最受欢迎的 DWAC 期权下月将暴跌 95
item.description: 周一，将唐纳德-特朗普的媒体公司上市的公司股价飙升，最受欢迎的期权合约可防止股票在短短几周内失去几乎所有价值。【原文：As share prices of the firm taking Donald Trump’s media company public soared on Monday, the most-popular option contract protects against the stock losing almost all of its value in just a few weeks.】

item.title: Gildan 投资者抨击董事会的出售过程 "不明智
item.description: Gildan Activewear 公司的一些大股东正在批评董事会正在进行的出售程序，指责此举在公司控制权争夺战中既不明智又不合时宜。【原文：Some major shareholders of Gildan Activewear Inc. are criticizing the sale process the board is conducting, blasting the move as unwise and ill-timed amid a fight over control of the company.】

Chief Executive Officer Lourenco Goncalves said he talked to the US government about ways to avoid antitrust issues when preparing a bid to buy United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: 瑞波公司的加林豪斯称美国证券交易委员会将在加密货币案中索赔 20 亿美元
item.description: 瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc.首席执行官布拉德-加林豪斯（Brad Garlinghouse）在 X 日表示，美国证券交易委员会将在有关 XRP 加密代币的法律诉讼中寻求 20 亿美元的罚款和处罚。【原文：Ripple Labs Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brad Garlinghouse said on X that the US Securities and Exchange Commission will seek $2 billion in fines and penalties in its legal fight over the XRP crypto token.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州高速铁路向投资者发出再融资邀请
item.description: 据知情人士透露，佛罗里达州的高速铁路系统 Brightline 正在向贷款方寻求高达 32 亿美元的新资金，以对其未偿债务进行再融资。【原文：Florida’s high-speed rail system, Brightline, is seeking up to $3.2 billion new capital from lenders to refinance its outstanding debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 基金一年来最看好墨西哥比索
item.description: 基金和资产管理公司将对墨西哥比索的看涨押注提高到了至少一年来的最高水平，因为该货币继续无视其被高估的呼声。【原文：Funds and asset managers boosted bullish bets on the Mexican peso to the highest level in at least a year as the currency continues to defy calls it’s overvalued.】

item.title: 纽约时报》称博尔索纳罗护照被扣押后藏身匈牙利大使馆
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周一报道，巴西前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗可能在匈牙利大使馆待了两天，因为当局扣押了他的护照，作为刑事调查的一部分。【原文：Former Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro may have spent two days at the Hungarian embassy after authorities seized his passport as part of a criminal investigation, the New York Times reported Monday.】

item.title: 西班牙政府购买西班牙电信 6.98 亿欧元股份
item.description: 西班牙收购了西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）3% 的股份，以对抗沙特电信公司（Saudi Telecom Co.【原文：Spain has acquired a 3% stake in Telefonica SA as it seeks to counter Saudi Telecom Co.’s plan to increase its shareholding in the company.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下 Encore 拟募集 5 亿美元优先股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blackstone Inc.支持的 Encore Group USA 正寻求筹集至少 5 亿美元的优先股权，因为该公司正与高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc.-backed Encore Group USA is looking to raise at least $500 million of preferred equity as it works with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to deal with loans that are set to come due in the next two years, according to people familiar with matter.】

item.title: 一些交易商在投票前以 75% 的亏损赎回与特朗普有关联的 SPAC 股票
